verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1859>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread<s%> drew <S%G1448>nigh,<s%> which is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he went his <S%G565>way,<s%> and communed <S%G4814>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4755>captains,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4934>covenanted<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G694>money.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1843>promised,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> in the absence <S%G817>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread,<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G2380>killed.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may eat. <S%G5315><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2309>wilt<s%> thou that we <S%G2090>prepare?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> when <S%G5216>ye<s%> are <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> there shall a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4876>meet<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G941>bearing<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of <S%G5204>water;<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he entereth in. <S%G1531><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye shall <S%G2046>say<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3617>goodman<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2646>guestchamber,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I shall <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>
And <S%G2548>he<s%> shall <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> a <S%G3173>large<s%> upper <S%G508>room<s%> furnished: <S%G4766><s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> make ready. <S%G2090><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G565>went,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2046>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they made <S%G2090>ready<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3957>passover.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he sat <S%G377>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> With <S%G1939>desire<s%> I have <S%G1937>desired<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3957>passover<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> I <S%G3754>will<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> any <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> thereof, <S%G1537><s%> <S%G846><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> it be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> I <S%G3754>will<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1081>fruit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G288>vine,<s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> shall come. <S%G2064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and gave <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> it, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> which is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> you: <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G364>remembrance<s%> of me. <S%G1699><s%>

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> after <S%G1172>supper,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> This <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> which is <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

But, <S%G4133><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of him that <S%G3860>betrayeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> table. <S%G5132><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> exercise lordship <S%G2961>over<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they that exercise authority <S%G1850>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> are <S%G2564>called<s%> benefactors. <S%G2110><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> be so: <S%G3779><s%> <S%G235>but<s%> he that is <S%G3187>greatest<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> let him <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3501>younger;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that is <S%G2233>chief,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> he that doth serve. <S%G1247><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>whether<s%> is <S%G3187>greater,<s%> he that sitteth at <S%G345>meat,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> he that <S%G1247>serveth?<s%> is <S%G3780>not<s%> he that sitteth at <S%G345>meat?<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> he that serveth. <S%G1247><s%>
<S%G1161><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> they which have <S%G1265>continued<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> temptations. <S%G3986><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye may <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G1189>prayed<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G4675>thee,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1587>fail<s%> not: <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> art <S%G1994>converted,<s%> <S%G4741>strengthen<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thee,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G817>without<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4082>scrip,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shoes, <S%G5266><s%> <S%G3361><s%> lacked <S%G5302><s%> ye any thing? <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3762>Nothing.<s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he unto <S%G846>them,<s%> But <S%G235><s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> a <S%G905>purse,<s%> let him <S%G142>take<s%> it, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>his<s%> scrip: <S%G4082><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> sword, let him <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G59>buy<s%> one. <S%G3162><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> that is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> be <S%G5055>accomplished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he was <S%G3049>reckoned<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> the transgressors: <S%G459><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G4198>went,<s%> as he was <S%G2596>wont,<s%> <S%G1485><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Pray <S%G4336><s%> that ye <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G645>withdrawn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> a <S%G3037>stone's<s%> <S%G1000>cast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> kneeled <S%G5087>down,<s%> <S%G1119><s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou be <S%G1014>willing,<s%> <S%G3911>remove<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> me: <S%G1700><s%> <S%G4133>nevertheless<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4674>thine,<s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G3700>appeared<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G1765>strengthening<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096>being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> an <S%G74>agony<s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> more <S%G1617>earnestly:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2402>sweat<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> as it <S%G5616>were<s%> great <S%G2361>drops<s%> of <S%G129>blood<s%> falling <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>ground.<s%>
